name: Don't Pop The Balloon - A Word Guessing Game
name_original: Don't Pop The Balloon - A Word Guessing Game
description:
Don't Pop The Balloon!

A word guessing game, but with balloons.

Try to guess the word! If you get a letter wrong, a balloon pops. Can you guess
the word without losing all of the balloons? Hints may be given to words longer
than four letters.

The themes to the words are: mostly positive, party and fantasy.

Window size: width, 1024 height, 600
